cmp: 氐 (name of an ancient tribe, foundation/on the whole)
mng: background, bottom, base, end (of the month, year etc), remnants, (math.) radix, base

exm.mng: finally, in the end, when all is said and done, after all, to the end, to the last
the end of the year, year-end
the back cover of a book
fundus of the eye (containing the choroid, retina, optic nerve etc), inside the eye, right in front of one's eyes, in full view as a panorama
